scripts.docker:clean: docker rm $(docker ps -q -f 'status=exited') || docker rmi $(docker images -q -f "dangling=true") || docker volume prune || docker system prune -a
scripts.docker:start:linux: docker build --tag docker-angular:development --file=development.Dockerfile . && docker run --interactive --tty --rm --name=docker-angular-development -p 4200:4200 -p 49153:49153 -v $(pwd):/tmp/app -v $(pwd)/node_modules:/tmp/app/node_modules docker-angular:development
scripts.docker:start:windows: docker build --tag docker-angular:development --file=development.Dockerfile . && docker run --interactive --tty --rm --name=docker-angular-development -p 4200:4200 -p 49153:49153 -v %cd%:/tmp/app -v %cd%/node_modules:/tmp/app/node_modules docker-angular:development
